Package Model

Class GameState

java.lang.Object
Model.Observable
Model.GameState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameState extends Observable implements Serializable
Class holds the data required to maintain the state of the game. This is implemented for helping with saving and loading game state
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GameState

      public GameState()
      Constructor to initialize the game data.

    • GameState

      public GameState(WargameMap p_map, String p_mapType, GamePhase p_gamePhase, Phase p_phase, ArrayList<Player> p_players, Player p_activePlayer, GameCard p_card, String p_phaseName)
      Constructor to initialize the game data.
      Parameters:
      p_map - Represents the state of the game.
      p_mapType - Domination/Conquest type map
      p_gamePhase - Phase the game is currently in
      p_players - List of players involved in the game
      p_phase - determine the phase of game
      p_activePlayer - Player who's turn is going on
      p_card - Card of cards.
      p_phaseName - its saves the name of the phase
